description: Notify the management entity on reaching the maximum allowable NTP client and peer associations.

event.Summary: Number of NTP client & peer association exceeds maximum threshold of $v1

description: The maximum number of peer and client associations that
the switch will serve. This helps ensure that the switch
isn't overwhelmed by huge numbers of NTP synchronization
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-NTP-MIB::alaNtpMaxAssociation
